prompt: An illustration of the EIT measurement tank ($\Omega$), the electrodes $e_l$, with a sample of the injection patterns. In black we show the \emph{adjacent} injections; in green \emph{all against} $e_1$; in pink \emph{all against} $e_9$; in magenta \emph{all against} $e_{17}$; in orange \emph{all against} $e_{25}$. Dashed injection are removed in the $2^{\text{nd}}$ challenge level; dotted ones in the $4^{\text{th}}$; dash dotted in the $6^{\text{th}}$.
